Description:
Detects potential persistence activity via startup add-ins that load when Microsoft Office starts (.wll/.xll are simply .dll fit for Word or Excel).

Author: NVISO
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Persistence Via Microsoft Office Add-In
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((filepath like '%microsoft\excel\xlstart\%' and filepath like '%.xlam') or (filepath like '%\microsoft\addins\%' and (filepath like '%.xlam' or filepath like '%.xla' or filepath like '%.ppam')) or (filepath like '%\microsoft\word\startup\%' and filepath like '%.wll') or (filepath like '%\microsoft\excel\startup\%' and filepath like '%.xll'))
